page.title: 17The Town of Neath.
page.content: Neath is a large town but seems to be in the process of change.At the moment it is still more or less industrial in character but there does seem to be a movement which suggests that tourism will play a more important part in the future of Neath. As more and more works are closing there seem to be various tourist attractions springing up to replace them.For instance at the moment we have the following which are open to the public:Penscynor Wildlife Park,Afan Argoed Country Park, Margam Abbey Country Park,Neath Abbey Monastery,Cefn Coed Coal Museum and Pelenna Mountain Centre.Also at the moment the Aberdulais Industrial Basin and the Vale of Neath Canal are being developed as tourist attractions.
